name: AdverseEvent
title: AdverseEvent
description: Actual or potential/avoided event causing unintended physical injury resulting from or contributed to by medical care, a research study or other healthcare setting factors that requires additional monitoring, treatment, or hospitalization, or that results in death.

elements.name: AdverseEvent
elements.description: Actual or potential/avoided event causing unintended physical injury resulting from or contributed to by medical care.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Business identifiers assigned to this adverse event by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

elements.name: actuality
elements.description: Whether the event actually happened, or just had the potential to happen. Note that this is independent of whether anyone was affected or harmed or how severely.

elements.name: category
elements.description: The overall type of event, intended for search and filtering purposes.

elements.name: event
elements.description: This element defines the specific type of event that occurred or that was prevented from occurring.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: This subject or group impacted by the event.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The Encounter during which AdverseEvent was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The date (and perhaps time) when the adverse event occurred.

elements.name: detected
elements.description: Estimated or actual date the AdverseEvent began, in the opinion of the reporter.

elements.name: recordedDate
elements.description: The date on which the existence of the AdverseEvent was first recorded.

elements.name: resultingCondition
elements.description: Includes information about the reaction that occurred as a result of exposure to a substance (for example, a drug or a chemical).

elements.name: location
elements.description: The information about where the adverse event occurred.

elements.name: seriousness
elements.description: Assessment whether this event was of real importance.

elements.name: severity
elements.description: Describes the severity of the adverse event, in relation to the subject. Contrast to AdverseEvent.seriousness - a severe rash might not be serious, but a mild heart problem might be.

elements.name: outcome
elements.description: Describes the type of outcome from the adverse event.

elements.name: recorder
elements.description: Information on who recorded the adverse event.  May be the patient or a practitioner.

elements.name: contributor
elements.description: Parties that may or should contribute or have contributed information to the adverse event, which can consist of one or more activities.

elements.name: suspectEntity
elements.description: Describes the entity that is suspected to have caused the adverse event.

elements.name: subjectMedicalHistory
elements.description: AdverseEvent.subjectMedicalHistory.

elements.name: referenceDocument
elements.description: AdverseEvent.referenceDocument.

elements.name: study
elements.description: AdverseEvent.study.
